about_the_game:
Have you ever hated someone? Or rather, is there something that made you so filled with hatred that you’ve forgotten what you were like before?

The official sequel to "The Haunted Mansion" is finally here: The Girl with Braids on the Second Floor!

In the infamous haunted building "Changrong Tower," security guard Li Cheng has come to understand the true nature of ghosts and their purposes. This time, he embarks on another adventure to help vengeful spirits, driven by a desire to uphold his deepest values.

With the terrifying ghost "Braided Girl" suddenly appearing in the building, not only are the security guards and residents on edge, but even the officials responsible for guarding the spirit realm are highly anxious. Li Cheng must face countless dangers to retrieve the sole "Relocation Consent Form." This time, he needs to conquer his greatest inner fears and find the "key" to solve the Braided Girl’s mystery.

However, this adventure is not a solitary one. In addition to the dependable ghost official "Guan Xia Lan" joining the effort, the new security guard Fan Yu will face numerous challenges alongside Li Cheng. Is he a friend or foe? How will Li Cheng uncover the truths of life through this ghostly journey? And where will his path lead? All answers will be revealed in this work.


Game Features:
The Girl with Braids on the Second Floor combines high-quality storytelling, realistic scenes, and mysterious puzzles to offer a horror game that emphasizes narrative depth. Although this game might not be the most outstanding horror experience and may seem somewhat inexpensive and simplistic compared to other domestic titles, we are dedicated to providing players with an immersive experience akin to watching a play, allowing them to savor the story and characters in detail.


Multiple Branches and Endings:
As a fully-fledged narrative game, your actions will influence the story’s development and its ending. With various achievements to unlock, join us in uncovering the truth and escaping the terrifying cycle.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains numerous horror elements, including depictions of ghosts and frightening scenarios.
